attributes.action: Pay Carers Allowance to carers for each individual disabled child or adult cared for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People like myself have an extremely hard job caring for more than one disabled individual yet can only apply for one carers allowance award.I think this is totally wrong considering the financial implications this has on a family and the total impact of daily life and savings to the government.
